sub_topic: Identifying the clique number of a graph.
message_1:
What is the clique number of the following graph?

Graph: 

```
     A -- B -- C
     |         |
     D -- E -- F
```

Possible Answer:

The largest clique in the given graph is {B, C, E, F}, so the clique number is 4.
message_2:
The graph can be represented as follows:

```
A -- B
|    |
D -- E -- C
     |
     F
```

In this graph, the largest complete subgraph (clique) is {A, B, D, E}, so the clique number is 4.
